resources.string: Faishal was born on October 26, 2006, in Banyumas. He is a beginner programmer with a strong desire to learn and grow in the world of technology. Faishal is a devout Muslim and believes in the potential of programming to make a positive impact.\n\nStanding at 170cm tall and weighing 48kg, Faishal is on his journey to becoming a proficient programmer. Currently, he is a student at SMKN 1 Purwokerto, where he is eager to acquire the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the field.
